Title: WinBudget
Description:
WinBudget is a simple C# WPF application that allows for the recording of income and expenses along with a few charts and statistics of your budget. It has been created in order to get rid of budget design in spreadsheets. This project is also being developed as I learn how to code in WPF.

Features will be expanding as the project continues. Refer to the Issue Tracker for upcoming features.
